overview: More episodes from the children's animated series following the adventures of Connor, Amaya and Greg (voices of Jacob Ewaniuk, Addison Holley and Kyle Harrison Breitkopf). After the three six-year-olds put on their pyjamas at night, they transform into their alter egos Catboy, Owlette and Gekko and set out to fight crime as the superhero team PJ Masks. The episodes are: 'Gekko and the Mighty Moon Problem', 'Catboy and Gekko's Robot Rampage', 'Owlette and the Owletteenies', 'Catboy and the Lunar Dome', 'Gekko and the Rock of All Power' and 'Owlette and the Moon-Ball'.
title: PJ Masks : Mighty Moon Problem
